yes

just trying to cover possible issues

you might need to add your ubuntu user to the users group, IIRC
depending on the conventions of your other distro
does ubuntu use the "users" group?

in ubuntu all files made by a user are user:user  not user:users ( eg peter:peter not peter:users )
